body:
# Karmi PhÃºc

## Profiles

[Facebook - phucnn](https://www.facebook.com/phucnn)  
[Twitter - karmiphuc](https://twitter.com/karmiphuc)  
[GitHub - karmiphuc](https://github.com/karmiphuc)  

## Summary

Full-stack Developer. Product Builder. Life-hacker. Google Enthusiast.

## Work

### IT Manager, [W&S Group](http://wsgroup-asia.com)
##### 2015-04-01 - 2016-04-01

* Lead 2 teams of 13 developers on Off-shore Coding projects and internal system development.
* Coordinate with 3 internal departments and 3 foreign offices, to ensure system functionality and availability across Japan - Vietnam - Indonesia - Thailand.
* Manage and sustain an on-premises server cluster (including Mail servers) for 8 services, 12 websites, nearly 500.000 users in total.

100% Japanese capital company. Utilizing dedicated market research panels in Vietnam, Thailand, and Indonesia, together with Research expertise in South East Asia, to provide the best service to support clients through challenges of research planning, fieldwork, analysis, translation, reporting.

### Full-stack Developer, W&S Group
##### 2012-08-27 - 2015-04-01

* Work independently or as a team in utilizing PHP Frameworks to create and maintain company products: Zend 1, Zend 2, PhalconPHP.
* Own the product, built with love: Build products from the ground to visualize company goals towards the mutual vision.
* Empower 3 other departments with tools and workflows to help them get things done.
* Best achievement is to optimize other departments' workflow: dramatically reducing manual efforts in Research Data Cleaning, from Days down to hours and minutes.





## Education

### University of Information Technology - Engineer in Information System
##### 2007-05-20 - 2012-08-06
GPA: 3.38




## Skills

* Advance in Web Development (PHP, Javascript)
* Intermediate in Digital Marketing (SEO, Social Media)
* Advance in Leadership (Team-building, Mentoring, Coaching)
* Intermediate in Product Development (MVP, UX/UI, Story-telling)

## Languages

* Business in English
* Beginner in Japanese

## Interests

* Sports (Soccer, Rock-climbing, Calisthenics)
* Intellectual (Blogging, Doodles, Life stories)

## References

> General Manager, W&S Group -- <cite>Toshiya Momota</cite>
> CTO, W&S Group -- <cite>Wataru Nabeyama</cite>
